accelerator:Strike.NAME: Strike
accelerator:Strike.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency.

accelerator:Defend.NAME: Defend
accelerator:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency.

accelerator:Reverse.NAME: Reverse
accelerator:Reverse.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reverse the order of your Orbs.
accelerator:Reverse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reverse the order of your Orbs. NL Evoke the next Orb.

accelerator:EvokeCommand.NAME: Evoke Command
accelerator:EvokeCommand.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Evoke the next Orb.

accelerator:KickStart.NAME: Kick-start
accelerator:KickStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Evoke your next orb. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Propulsion.NAME: Propulsion
accelerator:Propulsion.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency. NL Draw 1 card.

accelerator:Blaze.NAME: Blaze
accelerator:Blaze.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Thermal Orbs with !D! Potency. NL Exhaust 1 card from your hand.

accelerator:Friction.NAME: Friction
accelerator:Friction.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Focus. NL Every time you Evoke a Kinetic Orb, Channel a Thermal Orb with the same Potency.

accelerator:Intensify.NAME: Intensify
accelerator:Intensify.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Orb slots. NL Gain !M! Focus.
accelerator:Intensify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 2 Orb slots. NL Gain !M! Focus.

accelerator:Threaten.NAME: Threaten
accelerator:Threaten.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

accelerator:Knockback.NAME: Knockback
accelerator:Knockback.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency. NL Discard 2 cards.

accelerator:Deflect.NAME: Deflect
accelerator:Deflect.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency (Has 1 more potency for each Magnetic Orb currently Channeled).

accelerator:Polarize.NAME: Polarize
accelerator:Polarize.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL adjacent Magnetic Orbs. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency.

accelerator:MergeSort.NAME: Merge Sort
accelerator:MergeSort.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Orbs of the same type and sort them by potency (descending). NL Draw 1 card.
accelerator:MergeSort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Merge ALL Orbs of the same type and sort them by potency (descending). NL Draw 1 card.

accelerator:Radiation.NAME: Radiation
accelerator:Radiation.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (37 Damage in total)
accelerator:Radiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (49 Damage in total)

accelerator:PushOut.NAME: Push Out
accelerator:PushOut.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Evoke your next Orb.

accelerator:Cooldown.NAME: Cooldown
accelerator:Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Decrease potency of all currently Channeled Thermal Orbs by 2.

accelerator:GrowingPotential.NAME: Growing Potential
accelerator:GrowingPotential.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Push ALL Potential orbs to the back of Orb queue and trigger their passive effect !M! times.

accelerator:Spring.NAME: Spring
accelerator:Spring.DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Kinetic Orbs into single Potential Orb and push it to the back of Orb queue.
accelerator:Spring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Merge ALL Kinetic AND Potential Orbs into single Potential Orb and push it to the back of Orb queue.

accelerator:Superposition.NAME: Superposition
accelerator:Superposition.DESCRIPTION: Evoke the next orb NL !M! times. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
accelerator:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive effect of ALL your Orbs !M! times.

accelerator:Demagnetize.NAME: Demagnetize
accelerator:Demagnetize.DESCRIPTION: Magnetic Orbs no longer Evoke other Magnetic Orbs. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

accelerator:Newtons1.NAME: Newton's 1st Law
accelerator:Newtons1.DESCRIPTION: Kinetic Orbs don't decay for !M! turns.

accelerator:Newtons2.NAME: Newton's 2nd Law
accelerator:Newtons2.DESCRIPTION: Put the next Orb to the back of Orb queue and trigger it's passive effect twice.
accelerator:Newtons2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put next 2 Orbs to the back of Orb queue and trigger their passive effects twice.

accelerator:Newtons3.NAME: Newton's 3rd Law
accelerator:Newtons3.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your rightmost Kinetic orb. NL Gain !B! Block NL (equal to it's Potency).
accelerator:Newtons3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your most potent Kinetic orb. NL Gain !B! Block NL (equal to it's Potency).

accelerator:Roast.NAME: Roast
accelerator:Roast.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Weak.

accelerator:IceSandwich.NAME: Ice Sandwich
accelerator:IceSandwich.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Channel 1 Frost.

accelerator:KnockOut.NAME: Knock Out
accelerator:KnockOut.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply 1 Stunned. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Ground.NAME: Ground
accelerator:Ground.DESCRIPTION: Channel Potential and Kinetic Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable.
accelerator:Ground.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic and Potential Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable and Weak.

accelerator:DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
accelerator:DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Costs 1 less for every Potential Orb Channeled this combat.

accelerator:NuclearReactor.NAME: Nuclear Reactor
accelerator:NuclearReactor.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (12 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Plasma.

accelerator:EnergyTransfer.NAME: Energy Transfer
accelerator:EnergyTransfer.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you would lose HP, Channel a Kinetic Orb targeted at yourself with Potency of the HP you would've lost.

accelerator:Relativity.NAME: Relativity
accelerator:Relativity.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Potency of ALL your Orbs by 2. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for this turn.

accelerator:ClosedSystem.NAME: Closed System
accelerator:ClosedSystem.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Next turn, gain [E] .

accelerator:Impact.NAME: Impact
accelerator:Impact.DESCRIPTION: Channel 3 Kinetic Orbs with !D! Potency. NL Costs 1 less for every Kinetic Orb Channeled this turn.

accelerator:AllignedFields.NAME: Alligned Fields
accelerator:AllignedFields.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Trigger the passive effect of all your Magnetic Orbs.
accelerator:AllignedFields.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive effect of your rightmost Orb twice. NL Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Trigger the passive effect of all your Magnetic Orbs.

accelerator:SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
accelerator:SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic and Thermal Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (4 Damage in total)
accelerator:SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel Kinetic and Thermal Orb, both with !D! Potency. NL Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (5 Damage in total)

accelerator:Stabilize.NAME: Stabilize
accelerator:Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Heal 1 HP for every card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.
accelerator:Stabilize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Heal 1 HP for every card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:PerpetuumMobile.NAME: Perpetuum Mobile
accelerator:PerpetuumMobile.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, Channel a Kinetic Orb with !M! Potency.

accelerator:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
accelerator:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Set the Potency of all your Orbs to NL their average + !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Sets the Potency of all Orbs to

accelerator:Dynamo.NAME: Dynamo
accelerator:Dynamo.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every 5 Orbs you Evoke.

accelerator:DoubleSlit.NAME: Double Slit
accelerator:DoubleSlit.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency and randomly chosen target twice.

accelerator:Research.NAME: Research
accelerator:Research.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw a Skill or your draw pile is empty. NL Draw !M! cards.

accelerator:Investigation.NAME: Investigation
accelerator:Investigation.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until you draw 2 cards which do not cost 0 energy energy or your hand is full.
accelerator:Investigation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw cards until you draw 2 cards which do not cost 0 energy energy or your hand is full.

accelerator:Blizzare.NAME: Blizzare
accelerator:Blizzare.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (4 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Discard 1 card.
accelerator:Blizzare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Nuclear Orb with !M! Potency. NL (5 Damage in total) NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Discard 1 card.

accelerator:PiecingWhale.NAME: Piecing Whale
accelerator:PiecingWhale.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Apply !M! Piecing to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
accelerator:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Every time an Orb loses Potency, gain !M! times as much Block.

accelerator:Pull.NAME: Pull
accelerator:Pull.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Draw !M! card.
accelerator:Pull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Draw !M! cards.

accelerator:Engine.NAME: Engine
accelerator:Engine.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency and randomly chosen target X times.

accelerator:Streamline.NAME: Streamline
accelerator:Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Orb slot. NL Gain !M! Strength.

accelerator:MobiusLoop.NAME: MÃ¶bius Loop
accelerator:MobiusLoop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, trigger the passive effect of your leftmost Orb !M! times.

accelerator:Spin.NAME: Spin
accelerator:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a Skill, draw 1 card.

accelerator:Fragmentation.NAME: Fragmentation
accelerator:Fragmentation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for every Magnetic Orb you have.

accelerator:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
accelerator:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Potential Orb with !D! Potency. NL Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

accelerator:Drain.NAME: Drain
accelerator:Drain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL ( !M! % of your most potent Potential Orb's Potency). NL Decrease its Potency by 3.

accelerator:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
accelerator:Exchange.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Discard random card. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
accelerator:Exchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Discard 1 card. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

accelerator:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
accelerator:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Choose a new target for ALL Kinetic and Potential Orbs.
accelerator:Wormhole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a new target for ALL Kinetic and Potential Orbs and Evoke them.

accelerator:Reject.NAME: Reject
accelerator:Reject.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. Trigger the passive effect of your rightmost Orb !M! times and Evoke it.

accelerator:Fission.NAME: Fission
accelerator:Fission.DESCRIPTION: Every time you Evoke Plasma, decrease the cost of a random card in your hand by !M! for this combat.

accelerator:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
accelerator:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Transform ALL Thermal Orbs into Plasma. NL Exhaust.
accelerator:Overheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform ALL Thermal Orbs into Plasma.

accelerator:Magnetosphere.NAME: Magnetosphere
accelerator:Magnetosphere.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Gain 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.
accelerator:Magnetosphere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Gain 1 Artifact.

accelerator:MagneticResonance.NAME: Magnetic Resonance
accelerator:MagneticResonance.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency. NL Trigger its passive effect !M! X times.

accelerator:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
accelerator:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Channel X Thermal Orbs with !D! Potency. NL Draw X more cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Chaos.NAME: Chaos
accelerator:Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! random Orbs with 3 Potency (Not affected by damage or Block modifiers). NL Discard 1 random card.

accelerator:TheoryOfEverything.NAME: Theory Of Everything
accelerator:TheoryOfEverything.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals twice as much damage for every unique Orb you have.
accelerator:TheoryOfEverything.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals twice as much damage for every unique Orb you have.

accelerator:UniversalForm.NAME: Universal Form
accelerator:UniversalForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, gain Strength and Dexterity equal to the amount of unique Orbs you have. NL Lose it at the end of that turn.

accelerator:Encryption.NAME: Encryption
accelerator:Encryption.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !M! times (once for every unique Orb you have).

accelerator:Shove.NAME: Shove
accelerator:Shove.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency.

accelerator:Bake.NAME: Bake
accelerator:Bake.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive effect of your !M! leftmost orbs. NL Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency.

accelerator:Rage.NAME: Rage
accelerator:Rage.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Kinetic Orb with !D! Potency. NL Gain !M! strength for this turn.

accelerator:Vacuum.NAME: Vacuum
accelerator:Vacuum.DESCRIPTION: The next Orb you Channel this turn has twice as much Potency. NL Works only on Orbs with Potency.
accelerator:Vacuum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! Orbs you Channel this turn have twice as much Potency. NL Works only on Orbs with Potency.

accelerator:Induction.NAME: Induction
accelerator:Induction.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency and a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency NL ( !M! Potency for each enemy). NL Exhaust.
accelerator:Induction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel a Thermal Orb with !D! Potency and a Magnetic Orb with !B! Potency NL ( !M! Potency for each enemy). NL Exhaust.

accelerator:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
accelerator:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: ALL cards which cost 3 or more energy become free to play once.
accelerator:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL cards which cost 3 or more energy become free to play for the rest of the combat.
